00041 Symbol::Symbol( int characterData[ ], int dataLength, int startWith, int gapWidth, int ofType )
00042 {
00043         this->arrayIntoVector(characterData, dataLength, this->encodedSymbol);
00044         this->leadingElement = startWith;
00045         this->intercharacterGap = gapWidth;

00072 vector<int>* Symbol::getEncodedData( )
00073 {
00074         vector<int> *tempVector = new vector<int>;
00075         tempVector->insert( tempVector->begin( ), Symbol::encodedSymbol.begin( ), Symbol::encodedSymbol.end( ) );
00076         return tempVector;
00077 }

00130 #pragma mark --Private internal methods--
00131 
00132 void Symbol::arrayIntoVector( int source[ ], int sourceLength, vector<int> &destination )
00133 {
00134         int iter;
00135         try
00136         {
00137                 destination.clear( );                                                   //empty the destination
00138                 destination.resize( sourceLength );                             //resize it as we don't know that source and destination are same size
00139                 for ( iter = 0; iter < sourceLength; iter++ )   //loop through the source assigning to the destination
00140                 {
00141                         int holdingVar = source[ iter ];
00142                         destination.assign( iter, holdingVar );
00143                 }
00144                 if ( destination.capacity( ) == 0 )
00145                 {
00146                         throw "Array into Vector failed. Insufficient storage available.";
00147                 }
00148         }
00149         catch ( const char* str )
00150         {
00151                 cerr << str << " Program terminated." << endl;
00152                 exit( 0 );
00153         }
00154 }
